Notes :

ESET NOD32 :

1. Open the main window of ESET NOD32
2. In the left pane, select "Settings" -> "Activate the program"
3. Then select the "User name and password"
4. Enter the user name (Username) and Password (Password) -> Activate
5. Then click "Finish"

It is important !!! Turning off the Early Warning System.
Open the main window of ESET NOD32 -> Settings -> Go to the advanced settings ... (F5) -> collapsible section "Tools" -> ESET Live Grid -> Remove the check mark from the "Participate in ESET Live Grid -> We press" OK ".

Kaspersky :

KIS / KAV 2012-2013
1. Go to the menu "License management", it is in the lower right corner of the main window antivirus. Then remove the current key, pressing the red X next to its description. Then press the "Enter activation code"
2. In the next window, enter one of these activation codes:
- 3G79H-74355-DBPC8-4VX4Y
- BR64D-DPWME-41E31-XDMY4
- YY15F-TUMV3-6RPPK-2KV3Q
- 22222-22222-22222-2222U
Next, disconnect the computer from the Internet (you can just pull out at the time of the power cord from the system unit)
Then click "Next"
3. After the antivirus was not able to connect to the server on the Internet, it will display a window in which you need to click "Browse" button. In the window that appears, select the appropriate key file. Then click the "Next"
4. If everything was done correctly, you should see information about the successful activation.

Dr. Web :

1. On the taskbar, system tray, near the clock icon Find Doctor Web.
2. Click on the icon drweb right-click and from the menu select "Tools" the "License Manager" and click the left mouse button.
3. The window "License Manager". In the see information about the installed keys drweb.
4. In order to install antivirus key Doctor Web add it to the list of license manager. To do this, click on the search button and from the menu select the desired file in the selection window.

Avira :

1. Open the window and select the menu item "Help"
2. In the drop-down menu, select "License Management"
3. In the window looking for the words "I already have a valid license file HBEDV.KEY"
4. We press on "HBEDV.KEY"
5 shows a program where lies the key.
6. We rejoice at the successful activation
